QuestData.Title: Bounty: Twisted Ancient
QuestData.Description: The ancients of the Cursed Woods have been corrupted by demonic magic. Since they need to be destroyed, we might as well make use of their resources. Waste not, want not.$B$BBeware: these woodland behemoths are no easy targets. Gather trusted friends before you engage these twisted ancients.$B$B-- Baros Alexston
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Corrupted Lumber from a Twisted Ancient.
QuestData.RewardText: Unfortunate that the ancient guardians of the woods fell to such corruption.$B$BAt least now, its long nightmare has ended. Not to mention its sacrifice is our gain.
